title: CCNA 1 Overview
description: Introduction to the CCNA 1 course covering networking fundamentals and basic concepts.

title: OSI Model Deep Dive
description: Exploring the 7 layers of the OSI model.

title: Introduction to Subnetting
description: Understanding IP addresses and subnet masks.

title: VLANs and Switching
description: How VLANs work and their role in network segmentation.

title: Binary, Hex, and the Language of Networks
description: Understanding binary and hexadecimal in networking.

title: IP Addresses, Routing, and the IPv6 Revolution
description: Deep dive into IP addressing, routing principles, and the transition to IPv6.

title: Hostname, Security, IPs and the Vital Show Commands
description: Configuring hostnames, basic security, and using essential Cisco 'show' commands.

title: Unlimited Addresses, Next-Gen Internet
description: Exploring IPv6 features and its role as the next-generation internet protocol.

title: Basic Router Configuration
description: Learn how to configure routers for network connectivity, including interfaces and routing protocols.

title: IPv4 Addressing
description: Understanding IPv4 address classes, subnetting, and address assignment.

title: IPv6 Addressing
description: Introduction to IPv6 address format, configuration, and transition techniques.

title: Internet Control Message Protocol (ICMP)
description: How ICMP is used for error reporting and diagnostics in IP networks.

title: Transport Layer Protocols
description: Explore TCP and UDP protocols and their roles in network communication.

title: Application Layer Protocols
description: Overview of protocols such as HTTP, FTP, DNS, and their functions.

title: Network Security Fundamentals
description: Introduction to network security principles, including firewalls and access control.

title: Building a Small Network
description: Hands-on approach to designing and configuring a small scale network.

title: Decoding Ping, Traceroute, and the Vital Role of ICMP
description: Understanding how Ping and Traceroute work using ICMP.

title: Ping, Traceroute, and the Secrets of Small Network
description: Practical uses of Ping and Traceroute in small network troubleshooting.

title: Wi-Fi Fundamentals
description: An overview of Wi-Fi technology and standards.

title: Cable Shielding
description: The importance of shielding in network cables.

title: Modulation Techniques
description: Introduction to various signal modulation methods.

title: Applied Networking Summary
description: A quick recap of key applied networking concepts.

title: Getting your head around Databases and Statisics
description: Database: Foundations

title: Python Foundations
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of Python programming, covering syntax, data types, and control structures.

title: Infrastructure Cabling
description: Overview of infrastructure cabling systems, types of cables, and standards used in networking environments.

title: Frequencies
description: Understanding the basics of frequencies and their importance in signal transmission and networking.

title: Fibre vs Copper
description: Comparison of fibre optic and copper cabling, highlighting advantages and use cases in networking.

title: Cable Certification
description: Explains the process and standards involved in certifying network cables to ensure performance and reliability.
